title: The Liver Repair Toolkit by James Lee.epub {BD}
description:
Along with the brain and the heart, the liver has a strong case to claim its position as one of your most vital organs. It is involved in such as wide range of processes going on inside your body that when things go wrong with your liver, the consequences can be fatal.

However, despite its importance, we continue to bombard the liver with poor diet and lifestyle, along with the over-consumption of alcohol and drugs (both legal and illegal). Your liver is your front line defense against toxic substances, so when it cannot perform as required, problems can rapidly start developing.

Whether you have already been diagnosed with one of the various forms of liver disease (such as - hepatitis, alcoholic fatty liver or cirrhosis) or are keen to reverse years of mistreatment, these four supplements have strong clinical backing in restoring a damaged liver to full health through powerful cleansing and detoxification.

The bad news is that a poor diet and lifestyle can seriously damage your liver. The good news is that it is relatively easy to reverse this damage to make sure you that you take your liver to your grave and not the other way around!
